metadata.title: CVE-2024-34009 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient checks whether ReCAPTCHA was enabled made it possible tobypass the checks on the login page. This did not affect other pages whereReCAPTCHA is utilized.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
